scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npx vite build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.vercel-build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.steps:report: node -e "try { import('./tasks/step-tracker.js').then(tracker => { const tasks = tracker.parseStepsFile(); tracker.displayProgressReport(tasks); }).catch(e => console.error('Error loading steps tracker:', e.message)); } catch(e) { console.error('Error loading steps tracker:', e.message); }"
